text:
Spoken to my grandma today.
She was excited to tell me she’s been for her 1st round of Vaccine.
But....she lives in Bishopthorpe & her Vaccine was in Haxby, so she paid nearly £50 round trip in a taxi. @daviddunninguk @philbodmer @BBCLookNorth @theyorkmix #York #COVID19 #vaccine https://t.co/8XkLvboshk
